sn44:11.1.2_0: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yenāyasmā sabhiyo kaccāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn44:11.1.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sabhiyena kaccānena saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn44:11.1.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn44:11.1.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako āyasmantaṁ sabhiyaṁ kaccānaṁ etadavoca:
sn44:11.2.1_1: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti?
sn44:11.2.3_0: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44:11.2.4_1: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti?
sn44:11.2.6_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44:11.3.1_1: hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44:11.3.4_1: na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44:11.3.6_0: na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44:11.3.7_1: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44:11.3.9_0: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44:11.3.10_1: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44:11.3.12_0: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44:11.3.13_0: Ko nu kho, bho kaccāna, hetu, ko paccayo,
sn44:11.3.14_1: yo ca paccayo paññāpanāya rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā, so ca hetu,
sn44:11.3.14_2: so ca paccayo sabbena sabbaṁ sabbathā sabbaṁ aparisesaṁ nirujjheyya.
sn44:11.3.15_0: Kena naṁ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā”ti.
